column4: hellow all, have installed Ubuntu LTS and this is good to work with
The occasional complement is nice to hear among many complaints
have you considered other linux distributions too?
I tried linspire, then ubuntu, and settled (temporarily) on debian, so sometimes you'll like 2 or 3
well.. i would like to update to the newly released Gnome, any tips in howto, or is this included in the Synaptics
If you wait, edgy will be released in a few days
But it's not as stable as dapper (and probably will never be, It's not intended to be)
